alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 8:32PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COOK...SOUTH CENTRAL BERRIEN...LOWNDES AND SOUTHEASTERN BROOKS COUNTIES... At 832 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Valdosta, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Valdosta, Hahira, Ray City, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Cecil, Naylor, Barretts, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 29, Blue Springs, I-75 At Exit 22 and I-75 At Exit 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
